My worst moment was when I had to be away from my children for a week for a work trip.
I enjoy wearing suits that make a statement.
we are getting married in a park.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
I'm curious about the relationship between humans and animals, and how we can better understand each other.

participant_2.background:
I moved because I wanted to be closer to my new love.
i dyed my hair pink.
i am very good at math and science.
I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits.
My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.

content.text: I'm getting ready to move to New Mexico. How do you like it there?
I love it here! I moved here because I wanted to be closer to my new love.
That's sweet. How did you meet your love?
We met online and hit it off right away. I'm really happy I moved here.
That's great! I'm excited to move there.
You'll love it! It's a beautiful state with a lot to offer.
I'm sure I will. I'm looking forward to exploring it.
You should check out the mountains. They're beautiful.
I definitely will! Thanks for the tip.
No problem! It's a great place to live.
I can't wait to move there!
